info.title: iotDpsClient
info.description: API for using the Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service features.

get.description: List the operations for the provider

post.summary: Check if a provisioning service name is available.
post.description: Check if a provisioning service name is available. This will validate if the name is syntactically valid and if the name is usable

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: The request body

get.description: List all the provisioning services for a given subscription id.
Get a list of all provisioning services in the given resource group.
Get the metadata of the provisioning service without SAS keys.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

put.description: Create or update the metadata of the provisioning service. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the provisioning service metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: iotDpsDescription
parameters.description: Description of the provisioning service to create or update.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Update an existing provisioning service's tags. to update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: ProvisioningServiceTags
parameters.description: Updated tag information to set into the provisioning service instance.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

404.description: The Azure resource is not found

get.description: Get all the certificates tied to the provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

get.description: Get the certificate from the provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: Name of the certificate to retrieve.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the certificate.

put.description: Add new certificate or update an existing certificate.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: Name of the certificate to retrieve.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the certificate. This is required to update an existing certificate, and ignored while creating a brand new certificate.

parameters.name: certificateDescription
parameters.description: The certificate body.

delete.description: Deletes the specified certificate associated with the Provisioning Service

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: Name of the certificate to retrieve.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the certificate

parameters.name: certificate.name
parameters.description: This is optional, and it is the Common Name of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.rawBytes
parameters.description: Raw data within the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.isVerified
parameters.description: Indicates if certificate has been verified by owner of the private key.

parameters.name: certificate.purpose
parameters.description: A description that mentions the purpose of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.created
parameters.description: Time the certificate is created.

parameters.name: certificate.lastUpdated
parameters.description: Certificate last updated time.

parameters.name: certificate.hasPrivateKey
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate contains a private key.

parameters.name: certificate.nonce
parameters.description: Random number generated to indicate Proof of Possession.

post.description: Generate verification code for Proof of Possession.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: Name of the certificate to retrieve.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the certificate. This is required to update an existing certificate, and ignored while creating a brand new certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.name
parameters.description: Common Name for the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.rawBytes
parameters.description: Raw data of certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.isVerified
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate has been verified by owner of the private key.

parameters.name: certificate.purpose
parameters.description: Description mentioning the purpose of the certificate.

parameters.description: Time the certificate is created.

parameters.name: certificate.lastUpdated
parameters.description: Certificate last updated time.

parameters.name: certificate.hasPrivateKey
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate contains private key.

parameters.name: certificate.nonce
parameters.description: Random number generated to indicate Proof of Possession.

post.description: Verifies the certificate's private key possession by providing the leaf cert issued by the verifying pre uploaded certificate.

post.description: List primary and secondary keys for a specific key name

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.description: Logical key name to get key-values for.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

get.description: Gets the status of a long running operation, such as create, update or delete a provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: Operation id corresponding to long running operation. Use this to poll for the status.

parameters.name: asyncinfo
parameters.description: Async header used to poll on the status of the operation, obtained while creating the long running operation.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection

put.description: Create or update the status of a private endpoint connection with the specified name

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnection
parameters.description: The private endpoint connection with updated properties

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: Delete private endpoint connection with the specified name

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private endpoint connection

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: List private link resources for the given provisioning service

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

get.description: Get the specified private link resource for the given provisioning service

parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

get.description: Gets the list of valid SKUs and tiers for a provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

AllocationPolicy.description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

AsyncOperationResult.description: Result of a long running operation.

status.description: current status of a long running operation.

error.description: Error message containing code, description and details

CertificateListDescription.description: The JSON-serialized array of Certificate objects.

CertificateProperties.description: The description of an X509 CA Certificate.

expiry.description: The certificate's expiration date and time.

isVerified.description: Determines whether certificate has been verified.

certificate.description: base-64 representation of X509 certificate .cer file or just .pem file content.

created.description: The certificate's creation date and time.

updated.description: The certificate's last update date and time.

DeviceRegistryNamespaceAuthenticationTyp.description: Device Registry Namespace MI authentication type: UserAssigned, SystemAssigned.

DeviceRegistryNamespaceDescription.description: Description of the Device Registry namespace that is linked to the provisioning service.

resourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the Device Registry namespace.

authenticationType.description: Device Registry Namespace MI authentication type: UserAssigned, SystemAssigned.

selectedUserAssignedIdentityResourceId.description: The selected user-assigned identity resource Id associated with Device Registry namespace. This is required when authenticationType is UserAssigned.

ErrorMessage.description: Error response containing message and code.

GroupIdInformation.description: The group information for creating a private endpoint on a provisioning service

properties.description: The properties for a group information object

GroupIdInformationProperties.description: The properties for a group information object

requiredMembers.description: The required members for a specific group id

requiredZoneNames.description: The required DNS zones for a specific group id

IotDpsPropertiesDescription.description: the service specific properties of a provisioning service, including keys, linked iot hubs, current state, and system generated properties such as hostname and idScope

state.description: Current state of the provisioning service.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private endpoint connections created on this IotHub

provisioningState.description: The ARM provisioning state of the provisioning service.

iotHubs.description: List of IoT hubs associated with this provisioning service.

deviceRegistryNamespace.description: The Device Registry namespace that is linked to the provisioning service.

allocationPolicy.description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

deviceProvisioningHostName.description: Device endpoint for this provisioning service.

idScope.description: Unique identifier of this provisioning service.

authorizationPolicies.description: List of authorization keys for a provisioning service.

enableDataResidency.description:
Optional.
Indicates if the DPS instance has Data Residency enabled, removing the cross geo-pair disaster recovery.

portalOperationsHostName.description: Portal endpoint to enable CORS for this provisioning service.

IotDpsSkuDefinition.description: Available SKUs of tier and units.

value.description: The IotDpsSkuDefinition items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

IotDpsSkuInfo.description: List of possible provisioning service SKUs.

tier.description: Pricing tier name of the provisioning service.

capacity.description: The number of units to provision

applyAllocationPolicy.description: flag for applying allocationPolicy or not for a given iot hub.

allocationWeight.description: weight to apply for a given iot h.

name.description: Host name of the IoT hub.

connectionString.description: Connection string of the IoT hub.

location.description: ARM region of the IoT hub.

IpFilterActionType.description: The desired action for requests captured by this rule.

IpFilterRule.description: The IP filter rules for a provisioning Service.

filterName.description: The name of the IP filter rule.

action.description: The desired action for requests captured by this rule.

ipMask.description: A string that contains the IP address range in CIDR notation for the rule.

target.description: Target for requests captured by this rule.

IpFilterTargetType.description: Target for requests captured by this rule.

nameAvailable.description: specifies if a name is available or not

reason.description: specifies the reason a name is unavailable

message.description: message containing a detailed reason name is unavailable

NameUnavailabilityReason.description: specifies the reason a name is unavailable

display.description: The display information for the operation.

OperationInputs.description: Input values for operation results call.

name.description: The name of the Provisioning Service to check.

PrivateEndpoint.description: The private endpoint property of a private endpoint connection

PrivateEndpointConnection.description: The private endpoint connection of a provisioning service

properties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection

privateEndpoint.description: The private endpoint property of a private endpoint connection

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The current state of a private endpoint connection

PrivateEndpointConnectionsList.description: Represents a list of private endpoint connections.

PrivateLinkResources.description: The available private link resources for a provisioning service

value.description: The list of available private link resources for a provisioning service

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The current state of a private endpoint connection

status.description: The status of a private endpoint connection

description.description: The description for the current state of a private endpoint connection

actionsRequired.description: Actions required for a private endpoint connection

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionStatus.description: The status of a private endpoint connection

ProvisioningServiceDescription.description: The description of the provisioning service.

etag.description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

resourcegroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

subscriptionid.description: The subscription id of the resource.

properties.description: Service specific properties for a provisioning service

sku.description: Sku info for a provisioning Service.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

ProvisioningServiceDescriptionListResult.description: The response of a ProvisioningServiceDescription list operation.

value.description: The ProvisioningServiceDescription items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed

SharedAccessSignatureAuthorizationRuleAc.description: Description of the shared access key.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

State.description: Current state of the provisioning service.

TagsResource.description: A container holding only the Tags for a resource, allowing the user to update the tags on a Provisioning Service instance.

certificate.description: base-64 representation of X509 certificate .cer file or just .pem file content.

VerificationCodeResponse.description: Description of the response of the verification code.

isVerified.description: Indicate if the certificate is verified by owner of private key.
